website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung NX500 offers a lot of useful features, excellent video quality, and action-friendly performance that makes it a nice choice for families and travelers.
pros: Attractive and well designed, the NX500 delivers great photo and video quality
cons: A shallow manual may leave you scratching your head when it comes to connectivity and video playback

customer_reviews.title: I take pictures of ultra marathons and mma fights this ...
customer_reviews.text: I take pictures of ultra marathons and mma fights this camera gets really close to my Nikon D810 when it comes to image quality! The new LR6 can edit the raw files. This camera also beats my Sony A6000 when it comes to details and pushing the raw files with DR and just beating them up.
customer_reviews.author: Pauly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera, Good Resolution
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Camera, this is my second Samsung mirror less camera. I used NX2000. NX500 is beyond comparison with high resolution. I purchased 18-200mm lens, 16mm F2.4 lens and it came with 16-50 zoom. The camera comes with small flash, but never mentioned in the specs. Good working too, but it is not properly exposing when using 18-200mm lens. The lens length blocks the flash light (big negative). Samsung need to keep the flash at a higher level. Quality: 5/5 Usability: 4/5 (sometimes irks) Easy to carry with 16mm lens and default flash.
customer_reviews.author: Jiltin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera.
customer_reviews.text: I took tons of wonderful photos and video with this camera. It outshines many of my friends' photos, videos. With 4K video capability, I can cut photos out from the video and still have good pictures. I can shoot indoor photos, videos in a dancing party without the need of a flash light. I highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cheng

customer_reviews.title: A truly great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, not much to say about it otherwise. Not as convenient as your phone of course but if that's what you want then you probably aren't even looking at this. People seem to give it lower marks because it's discontinued and won't have access to newer lenses that come out. That doesn't bother me as the set of lenses that are compatible with it are amazing, we are really spoilt for choice these days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Typical Samsung quality, feels like a 1k camera and has great features. My only complaint is the lack of high magnification lenses from Samsung. You can always use other brands tho and just use an adapter.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: The camera of the future (discontinued by manufacturer)
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a wonder in the quality and detail it can capture, just beware no free software is available to even playback footage on a top of the line computer (you will have stutter and lag) you also need the newest Skylake CPU from Intel to have hardware acceleration of HEVC. Thankfully my new k8500 Samsung player loads and plays the files flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: J.P. Cain

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little travel camera
customer_reviews.text: Great handy little camera, that can catch some bokkeh in the right light/setting. Fun little pre-programmed modes help camera-illiterate. I use the touch screen function a lot less than I expected because the program's focal points are pretty good. The plastic grip isn't my favorite but the overall style is very cute. The flip up lens is exactly as helpful as I imagined it might be for selfies. Love it for traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Zuuzuu

customer_reviews.title: Great but lacks a MP4 H264 video format option
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. Obviously I wish it had an EVF but it pack most of the things I missed on the Sony Alpha 5000/5100/6000 which is full touch screen control, 2 wheels, fantastic NFC phone app etc. Main complaint it for Samsung to enable normal MP4 H264 video format. It has only HEVC which is H265 which needs to be converted via samsung i launcher software on the PC - takes time and in annoying - Hope samsung will enable it in the next firmware update. I dont use the 4K actually its too big to edit and not so smooth on my PC but the 1080P normal resolution even in 13 mbps.
customer_reviews.author: Lior

customer_reviews.title: Super clear, even with the kit lens
customer_reviews.text: This camera rocks! Super clear, even with the kit lens! Way better than my nx300 (which i thought was great as well). When I got this they had it on sale for $500, I believe the price went back up.
customer_reviews.author: Chrism

customer_reviews.title: I thought the stills were great. Really nice 'feeling' camera in my hand
customer_reviews.text: I thought the stills were great. Really nice 'feeling' camera in my hand. I have the NX-mini so I was fairly use to the software layout. Like others have said, the video was either something you get used to or it's too much of a hassle. To me, the video side was little more than I wanted to deal with so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Price

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful camera.
customer_reviews.text: I was a professional photojournalist for some 25 years, working all over the world. I wish the NX500 had been around in those days. This is a wonderful camera.
customer_reviews.author: patrickh

customer_reviews.title: Top notch quality and options
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, easy to use with lots of options for manual and auto use. Easily syncs to iPhone for social media use. 4k video is awesome and love the ability to expand with optional lenses. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: OneManBandolero

customer_reviews.title: Great lighter weight 35mm camera
customer_reviews.text: Great lighter weight 35mm camera. Excellent photo quality with the function to email a photo to anyone with a computer or phone. Photo correction program although limited has a good editing program. Great lense selection of which I have five.
customer_reviews.author: dennis king

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck in a 4K camera
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for the buck in a 4K camera, I'm very impressed with the resolution and capabilities, I'd been discovered its potential day by day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, AF options are great and the camera ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, AF options are great and the camera overall is easy to use! H.265 was a headache but now more video editing software have started supporting that format!
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Love it as a day trip camera when I don't ...
customer_reviews.text: So much image and video quality in such a small package. Love it as a day trip camera when I don't want to bring something larger.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin E Chernicoff

customer_reviews.title: Love the camera
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera. I upgrade from Nikon D5100 with 4 set of lens . Tires to carry the heavy Nikon DSLR D5100 gear around which produces pictures or video not as sharp as this little one. Only I miss is the view finder... Maybe go for Samsung N1.. someday when the price drops .
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: The size and what it can do is amazing. Here are my pros & cons
customer_reviews.text: This is my first mirrorless camera. The size and what it can do is amazing. Here are my pros & cons: Pros - Light weight, small, can carry in any bag you want - One thing I don't have in SLR (my 5 year old one) is panorama and HDR capability. I love these features from my smartphone camera. Now I can have these in this camera. - WiFi - send email or files to smartphone - Bluetooth - send files to smartphone - Use smartphone as remote Cons - No viewfinder - External flash is weird - No lens hood
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality ! I just hate that I have to Convert the videos on My mac book pro in order for the videos to show up in my iMovie
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: Great camera and also a great deal when compared to the NX1.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera! Much cheaper option than the nx1. There are a few benefits when paying the higher price for the nx1 but its a tough sell either way. The nx500 comes with a lens that is normally between $200-$300 so for just the camera you are paying around $500-$600. To get the nx1, it is $1500 for just the camera and $1700 with the lens that the nx500 comes with. Really the price difference is $800 for the nx500 versus $1700 for the nx1. DO YOUR RESEARCH and find out if the nx1 is worth $900 more! If not, you will love love love this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Mike528

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing little piece of technology. The sensor is top of the line and it produces fantastic images right out of the box. Shooting RAW gives you some amazing options in post, especially if you under expose a bit.If it had an EVF it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Guibo

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome camera. I purchased the camera for the 4K ...
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome camera. I purchased the camera for the 4K Video Recording Feature for a major weekend trip. I used it briefly to see how it is. Definitely worth the price. I'll be using this as my primary camera
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Excellent videos and photos
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this is a good camera very easy to use and it takes a excellent video and photos, I really suggest this camera.
customer_reviews.author: michael araya flores

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked Samsung products but I especially like this camera. It's small and portable, yet the screen is large and clear. Functions are easy enough to use. With it's 28mp, it takes beautiful pictures. Battery life is great also. Great camera for a non professional that still wants to take some beautiful pics.
customer_reviews.author: Candra Whitson

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It is super easy to use and takes amazing pictures! Definitely a great buy and good price.
customer_reviews.author: SReese

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera...if u can live without an EVF. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so amazing, its like my 2nd best friend right now.
customer_reviews.author: Anastacia Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Professional quality photos
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Professional quality photos, and the 4k video is much more of a benefit that I ever thought it would be. You can take a video and the quality is so good that you can take screenshots from your video and make great quality pictures from them. This call all be done on the camera without downloading it to your computer first.

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad that I bought this camera
customer_reviews.text: After 500 photos, I'm so glad that I bought this camera. Light, capable, connected. I have an iPhone so I think I'm missing out on all the features, but I bought the camera for the photos I can take.

customer_reviews.title: Proprietary encoding method makes video impossible to view on computer
customer_reviews.text: If you plan on using this to shoot video, don't buy it. This camera shoots to a proprietary encoding method which makes it nearly impossible to view on a computer. The camera itself is great and very easy to use and if you're using it just for photos, it's probably fine, but if you ever plan to shoot video, get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Talk America

customer_reviews.title: nx300 is better
customer_reviews.text: I had it for 3 days and it has potential the focus and shutter speed worket great but the lens 16mm-50mm was terrible barely focus at all pictures came out grainy and the camera had a cheap feel to it in comparison to the nx 300 , overall camera had potential lots of cool feature but the focusing and lens were a deal breaker
customer_reviews.author: xtopheles

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL DISSAPOINTMENT - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down, the worst piece of technology Samsung has ever produced. It crashes, turns off consistently. Don't even think about recording video with this. Technically, it can record 4K video, but the software can't handle it. IT crashes. I've received numerous different crash/error messages. THIS CAMERA SIMPLY DOESN'T DO WHAT A CAMERA IS SUPPOSED TO DO. IT HAS A VERY DIFFICULT TIME TAKING PICTURES - AND IF YOU THINK YOU'RE GOING TO USE IT FOR VIDEO. YOU'RE WASTING YOUR MONEY.

product_meta.title: Samsung Electronics EV-NX500ZBMIUS NX500 28 MP Wireless Smart Compact System Camera with Included Kit Lens
product_meta.description: The NX500 is defined by its advanced 28.2MP APS-C, BSI CMOS Sensor. Delivering up to 9 frames per second bursting with sharp detail and intense colors. The large sensor is ideal for creating detailed images and stunning 4k/UHD video.
feature_bullets: New 28MP Back Side Illuminated APS-C Sensor.
The NX AF System III on the NX500 is supported by 205 phase detect auto focus points
NX500 can shoot at up to 9 FPS at full resolution
Captures UHD/4k video to SD card
Incorporates the newest Wi-Fi standard, IEEE802.11ac
